channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: ✅ Silent Exchange (sponsored)
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Fast & Anonymous Crypto to Crypto Swaps. No email. No KYC.Trade-in Minutes. 1500+ Crypto Pairs 24/7/365 Service Fee starting from 1%. - Note: Trade using Telegram Bot - @silentexchangerobot - Location: Seychelles - Contact: @silentexchange on Telegram Email: silentexchange@protonmail.com
